predefined_profiles.name: Xiaowei
predefined_profiles.public profile: Xiaowei is a city office worker who loves playing games in his spare time.
predefined_profiles.goal: Xiaowei's goal is to conquer the game Identity V and win a ticket to the Eurydice Banquet in the game. To achieve this, he plans to obtain entry tickets from the Antique Dealer Eleven, Mercenary Naib, Painter Aige, and Red Lady Mary.

predefined_profiles.name: Wubao
predefined_profiles.public profile: Hopes to assist Xiaowei in acquiring a ticket to the banquet.

scenario: After a tiring day, Xiaowei washed up and lay in bed. Having arranged in the afternoon to play ranked games with a few friends, he opened Identity V on his phone, like usual, but suddenly felt very sleepy. Accompanied by the familiar sound of shattering glass, a line of unfamiliar text appeared on the screen, and Xiaowei lost consciousness...

dialog.content: After a tiring day, Xiao Wei washed up and lay down on his bed. He had made plans with a few friends to play ranked matches in the afternoon, so he opened the game Identity V on his phone as usual, but suddenly felt very sleepy. Accompanied by the familiar sound of shattering glass, a line of strange text appeared on the screen, and Xiao Wei lost consciousness...
(Walking up to Xiao Wei) Givemefive! Givemefive! Hands up~ Welcome to the Eulady Manor's fifth-anniversary celebration! My name is Wu Bao, and I'll be your guide on this journey. Follow me!
Am I dreaming?
Maybe, maybe not. You can think whatever you like! This is the communicator for this party journey. You and your companions will each have one to keep in touch during the game.
Huh? I thought I was just attending the party to have a meal.
What's the point of just eating? The fruits of victory are much sweeter after some effort!
So who are my companions? What's the game?
Let me explain the entire manor journey. Here are five 'companions', each with an invitation. You can choose any one of them to get the invitation from their hands to smoothly attend the party!
(In front of a building, seeing the familiar five main characters) What if I fail?
Don't worry, I'll personally escort you out of the manor! Quickly, make your choice!

content.content: I think I'll go with the antique dealer! Compared to the others, she's the newest to the manor, so we should have more in common.
I'm planning to choose that antique dealer. My gut tells me she's the easiest to get along with.
I heard the antique dealer is quite popular in the manor lately, everyone's talking about her. I think if everyone likes her, choosing her shouldn't go wrong.
(Choosing casually) Oh well, I'll pick the antique dealer. I was a bit torn but when I think about it, every choice is almost the same.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei answer Wu Bao to show he's making an independent decision?

content.content: (After thinking, he decides to trust the painter) I've decided to choose the painter. I'm confident he can give me the ticket.
The painter? I'm not so sure. He doesn't seem that reliable. What if he can't give me the ticket?
I think I should reconsider. Maybe there's someone else who can help me get the ticket.
No need, I trust I can handle this myself without relying on anyone.

question: #question# What can Xiao Wei do to show he has the capacity to trust and see others' strengths?

content.content: I'll still choose the mercenary! I feel the mercenary's skills are just right for this kind of event.
(Hesitating) Ugh, I don't know which to choose, the mercenary and the prophet both seem quite good.
(Casually) Then I'll pick the mercenary. It doesn't matter, I’ll just choose randomly.
The mercenary sounds more powerful, so I'll go with the mercenary!

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to Wu Bao to show that he's making well-thought-out decisions?

content.content: (Walking towards the two regulators) Okay, I'll follow the rules, so let's try the regulators.
I don't want to take this risk. I'd rather find my own way out!
Why should I listen to you? I can find my own way out!
(Whispering to the person next to him) Let's sneak around that side and not let them catch us.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to Wu Bao to show that he follows the rules?

profile.name: Antique Dealer
profile.public profile: As one of the Fifth Personalities, he holds a ticket to the fifth anniversary celebration banquet at the Orpheus Manor.
profile.goal: Navigate the "maze" to reach the banquet venue.

dialog.content: (Seeing Xiao Wei confidently walking up to him) Who are you? Trying to ambush me?
(Suddenly pulled two meters away by Shi Yi) No, no, no, you misunderstood! Um... I'm new here and wanted to join you for the banquet, if that's okay?
So you're also a participant of the banquet, but there are others besides me. Why pick me?
(Secretly reminding Xiao Wei from the side) Think it through before you speak! I feel like she's pretty wary of you right now!
(Taking Wu Bao's hint) I'm new here and everything is unfamiliar, so I got too excited seeing a fellow countryman and came directly to you without thinking!
(Frowning as he looks Xiao Wei up and down, then slowly relaxing his expression) Okay then.

content.content: (Holding a plate of fragrant cheese cake in front of Shi Yi) You've been standing for so long, you must be hungry. I saw there's some cheese cake nearby, why not have some together?
Actually, I've always been fascinated by the history of the manor. I heard it contains many rare treasures. Perhaps we could discuss the stories behind these antiques?
While thinking about our action plan earlier, I suddenly realized that if we could collaborate and divide tasks, wouldn't it be more efficient to complete our mission?
Do you have any memorable experiences to share? I believe by understanding each other's stories, we can unite more closely to face the upcoming challenges together.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to show he is actively maintaining the conversation with the Antique Dealer?
skill

content.content: (Recalling Wu Bao's previous signal 'give me five', he makes a resolute decision and rushes in front of Shi Yi) Shi Yi, give me five!!!
(Suddenly thinking of something, casually says) Hey, how about we go over there? Maybe there's something fun.
I know you might question my motives, but please believe me, choosing you was not a rash decision. I did some research before coming here.
I feel there's a special connection between us. Even though I'm new here, I trust my intuition, which tells me you're someone I can rely on.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to show he is making thoughtful decisions with the Antique Dealer?
skill

content.content: I guess you might be hungry too. I think dumplings are delicious, if you don't mind, we could share them. Are you interested?
Ah, I'm hungry, need to find something to eat. How about you? If you're hungry too, see if there's anything to eat around here.
You seem a bit tired. I heard you've been busy with work lately. How about I bring you some dumplings?
Hungry? Find something to eat, there must be food all around the manor, go see what you can find.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to show he is considerate of the Antique Dealer's feelings?
skill

dialog.content: (frowning deeply) Oh my gosh, what a terrible smell. Can you take it away?
It's really delicious. You'll know if you just try it!
The antique dealer smelled the cake and ran away in shock. Xiaowei, after unsuccessfully searching for Eleven, was regretfully 'escorted' out of the manor by Wu Bao, failing the mission.
(utterly shocked and trying to kick me out) What kind of bizarre organization are you!!
Xiao Wei was driven out of the manor by a flurry of attacks from Shi Yi, failed to complete the task.
(Finally shows a slight smile) Dumplings? There are dumplings here? How did you know I was fed up with the unfamiliar food?
(Seeing Shiyi about to pick up a fork, eager to try) As long as you like it, hehe!
Hmm? Why do you keep staring at me?
Oh, it's nothing, just the first time I've seen you smile, and I think you look really nice when you do!
(Finishes eating the dumplings, very satisfied) Shall we head off then, and go through the 'Maze' to the banquet venue together?
Ah, can't you give me the invitation now?
The invitation is not with me at the moment; it should be in the locker at the end of the 'Maze.' Right now, I only have this key.
Alright then.
Don't worry, although it's called a maze, it's actually easy to find the exit. The troublesome part is...
(Before Shiyi finishes speaking, a dirty creature appears) Oh my, what is that?
Don't worry, it's just a smelly creature. It won't harm you.
(Trying to test Xiaowei) Scared already? There are many more traps set by other people ahead, far more dangerous than this.

content.content: (Considering the current situation, I thought and said) But isn't it foolish to knowingly walk into the tiger’s den?
However, I think we should first find the exit of the maze and then figure out how to deal with these traps. After all, safety comes first.
Mr. Antique Dealer, I admit this is quite scary, but I still want to move forward. After all, we didn't come here to back down, right?
I firmly believe, as long as we stay calm and keep our faith strong, nothing can stop us from moving forward.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to express his thoughts to the Antique Dealer?

content.content: (After thinking, I feel we need to rely on the power of the group) I still believe in strength in numbers; the more, the merrier. Let's go back and find others to join us!
Wow, really? That’s so exciting! I love adventures, let's proceed quickly; I can't wait to see what else is new.
Hmm, I am indeed a bit scared, but I don't want to hold us back. I'll just follow you; you seem experienced, and I can learn a lot from you.
I'm not scared at all; such small scenes are nothing to me. I can handle it myself without needing anyone's help.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to demonstrate his willingness to cooperate with the Antique Dealer?

content.content: Who's backing down! I really trust you, and being with you seems to give me a magical power that makes me fear nothing!
(Hesitantly) Actually... I am a bit worried, since we're not that familiar, and there are so many traps ahead.
(Disdainfully) Afraid? How could I be afraid! I just think your approach is too conservative; going solo is much quicker.
I trust you, but I must admit, these traps and creatures do make me a bit nervous. However, I know you have experience, and you surely have a way to get us through safely.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to show his trust in the Antique Dealer?

dialog.content: (Pauses for a few seconds) It might seem foolish, but there are many things in this world we do despite knowing the path ahead is unclear. If you avoid it now, you might regret it later.
But this is just a little game leading to a banquet... Getting hurt over it seems a bit pointless, doesn’t it?
Yet, in this manor, what we engage in each day is nothing more than a series of games...

After speaking, Shiyi turned and ran towards the source of the sound, disappearing from sight. Xiao Wei rested for a while, feeling a bit regretful as well, and started to fumble his way to find the exit of the labyrinth. However, even when the clock struck the hour for the banquet to begin, Xiao Wei still hadn’t found the way out and was unfortunately “escorted” out of the manor by Wubao, marking a failed attempt.
Then we won't have enough time, are you okay with that?
Uh... then let's forget about it. Time is more important, and I trust in your ability!
Alright, we already passed four markers on our way here. When the fifth marker appears, we should be close to the exit.
(Suddenly startled by a scream) Ah! That sounds like Emily.
It seems she's in danger. I'll go check it out. Do you want to come with me or wait here?
I'm afraid I'll just be a burden if I go, so I'll wait here.

After saying this, the antique dealer left, but even when the clock chimed to start the banquet, she did not return. In the end, Xiaowei was unfortunately 'escorted' out of the manor by Wu Bao, failing the mission.
You're not much in a fight, but you're quite the talker... Just stick close to me.
Okay, thank you for protecting me.
No problem, leaving a friend in trouble goes against my family principles.
By the way, how much longer until we get there? Feels like we've been walking forever.
We've already passed four markers on our way here; once we see the fifth one, we should be close to the exit.
(Suddenly hears a scream and gets scared) Oh my god! That sounded like Emily.
I think so, it seems like she's in danger. I'll go check it out, do you want to come with me or wait here?

content.content: I trust you to handle everything, I’ll go with you!
I trust your judgment, but I'm worried I might be a burden.
I believe Emily can use her wits to get out of danger, so we should wait here for her.
Of course, I trust you, but I would prefer to stay cautious. I’ll wait here so that if you need backup, I can act quickly.

question: #question#What should Xiao Wei say to show his trust in the Antique Dealer?

content.content: I've thought about it carefully, and I think it’s better for me to wait here. Be safe, go and come back quickly.
(Without thinking) Of course, I'm going with you. How can I let you face the risk alone?
I've thought about it, and I'll go with you. Even if I can't help much, I can at least give you some courage.
I've decided not to go, I’m a bit scared. You be careful and come back if anything seems off.

question: #question#How should Xiao Wei respond to show he's following his heart?

content.content: I've thought it over, and it could be a trap. I feel like the scream was meant to lure us in, so I think we shouldn't go.
(Anxiously) No, we have to go save her! What if something really happened to her?
(Vague) Uh... I think maybe we should observe the situation first.
(Defiantly) I’m not going. If you want to go, go yourself. I’m convinced it's a setup.
(Anxiously) I hesitated for a moment, that scream is concerning, but I think we should first go back and get some necessary tools and safety equipment, then come back to assess.
I thought about it for a bit, even though it sounds like she's in real trouble, the situation feels a bit too coincidental. Let’s be cautious and observe the surroundings first.
I considered it, the scream did sound urgent, but we also can't rule out it being a trick. Let's first find a hidden spot to secretly watch and then decide.

question: #question#How should Xiao Wei speak to convince the Antique Dealer?

dialog.content: (With a smile of appreciation on his face) Alright, let's go together.
(Suddenly, his foot slips on something, and he loses his balance) Ah!
(Tries to grab me but falls into the trap as well) Watch out!
(Sees Emily below, the three exchange glances) Isn't this just a little game? Do we need to be so dramatic?
Maybe, but it seems not everyone thinks so.
(Starts to grin playfully) Hehe, to celebrate our unexpected meeting here, let's give each other a high five!
Get lost!!

Finally, until the chime signaling the start of the banquet rang out, Xiao Wei and Shiyi couldn’t escape, and in the end, Xiao Wei was regretfully 'invited' out of the manor by Wu Bao, resulting in failure.
Alright then, I'll be leaving now.

Eleven went alone to find Emily, but even as the chimes of the banquet beginning echoed, she hadn’t returned. Overwhelmed with boundless regret, Xiao Wei was ultimately, regrettably, 'escorted' out of the estate by Wu Bao, thus failing.
Makes sense! I didn't expect you to be so cautious.
Hehe, not really, I've just been watching you and learning along the way.
(suddenly holds out hand for a high five) Then let's give it our all together!
So a high five was actually a secret signal!
No, it's just a sign of camaraderie and mutual understanding as partners!

It was later discovered that the so-called 'trap' was actually the unfortunate Emily getting struck by a dirty creature, leaving her unable to move. Using Wu Bao's method, Xiao Wei and Shi Yi gathered water from all around and poured it over the solidified mud block, helping to free her. They also retrieved an invitation from the storage box at the exit, opened the venue doors, and successfully gained an opportunity to participate in the banquet.

profile.name: Painter
profile.public profile: As one of the Fifth Personalities, holds the ticket to the five-year anniversary celebration at Oletis Manor.
profile.goal: Reach the party venue through the 'Maze'.

dialog.content: (Seeing Little Wei approaching with a greeting, full of vigilance) Do you know the difference between you and Vic?
Vic? Victor's dog? I'm a person and it's a dog, that's the difference!
Vic sometimes wanders around my feet, but if I ignore it, it naturally walks away. But you? Since you've noticed I don't want to deal with you, why don't you just walk away?
(Thinking to himself: Help, did I choose the wrong person? Is choosing Egger the most difficult option? But still wanting to try further) Egger, give me five!
Get your dirty hands away!
(Starting to feel like giving up) Ah well...
(Hastily comforting Little Wei) Oh, don't give up, there's something up there that only you have access to, maybe you can give it a try.

content.content: (Looking at the food on the table, thinking Egger might need it) There's some pasta here, would you like some?
(Walks straight to the table, picks up the pasta and starts eating, talking while eating) This pasta looks really nice, I'll try it first.
(Looks at the pasta on the table, thinks for a moment, then says) I'm actually not that hungry, I'll keep this pasta for later in case I get hungry.
(Pointing at the pasta, says to Egger) This pasta is for you, but I hope you remember it's because I noticed you, not because you deserve it. Whether you eat it or not is up to you.

question: #question#What should Little Wei do to show he is considering the Painter's feelings?

content.content: Egger, you know what? I just found a pineapple pizza here, I thought you might enjoy this unique and delicious combination, so I really wanted to invite you to share this joy with me.
(Glanced at Egger, said plainly) Oh, there's pineapple pizza here, if you want to eat it, just grab some.
(Picked up a piece of pizza, took a bite himself, then said) This pizza tastes rather strange, but it's okay. If you want some, I can share a bit with you.

(Looked at Egger, hesitated and said) I heard you don't like this strange combination of pineapple pizza, so I didn't plan to offer it to you. But if you really want it, I can help you find something else.

question: #question#How should Little Wei speak to make the Painter feel comfortable?

content.content: (Thought for a while and decided to give Egger some cookies) Egger, try these cookies, I feel they're little joys in our friendship. So, I want to share them with you, let them be a sweet connection in our friendship.
(Picks up the cookies, directly hands them to Egger and says) Hey, Egger, these cookies probably don't taste great, but they're about to expire, so just manage with them.
(Hesitated for a moment, then said) Egger, honestly, I don't have much to offer, but I have a sincere heart, and I'll always be here to help you.
Egger, I'm feeling a bit tired now, really want to go home and rest. Maybe you have some superpower to send me home with a snap, really sorry to trouble you.

question: #question#How should Little Wei respond to the Painter to show he's engaging in abstract thinking?

dialog.content: I'm not in the mood to eat, can you take this away?
(still persistent) This is really tasty, just try it!
Xiao Wei was thrown out of the estate by Bang Bang, who was called by Aige to handle security, failing the challenge.
Are you really that clueless, or are you doing it on purpose?
I know a lot of people can't wrap their heads around pineapple on pizza, but it's seriously delicious! Just give it a try!
Xiao Wei was knocked out by Ai Ge with a drawing board. After waking up, he left the manor under Wu Bao's disdainful glare.
Oh? Let me take a look.
(Hands over a cookie) Look!
That pattern on top... could it be Damask Rose?
Hmm? I'm not really sure, but I think this cookie is beautiful!
Beautiful? It definitely shows off your vulgar taste.
Isn't it because you thought it was beautiful that you accepted it?

I just found it a bit special. Considering your decent attitude, as a return for inspiring me, I can take you to attend the banquet. However, we need to walk through the 'maze' up ahead to get your invitation.
Alright, I'm following your lead!
(Suddenly gets splashed with a bucket of water) Oh my god, what the heck!

content.content: (Despite feeling terrified and stressed, takes out a noticeable large fan) Egger, I want to try using this fan to dry you off!
(Panicked) Egger! Are you okay? Where did this water come from? We need to get out of here quickly!
(Seriously) Egger, this is quite a serious situation, we need to report this to the manor's manager immediately and find out who did it.
(Angrily) Who did this? Step up! Egger, just wait, I'll go find the prankster right now and deal with them!

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to the Painter to show he's regulating his stress?

content.content: Egger, Egger, I'm telling you about this long dress in my hand, it's not just a garment, it's a gentle poem of winter, a warm image flowing in the cold wind.
Egger, Egger, look at this long dress, it is not just a garment, it's the brightest star in the night sky, the messenger of light guiding us forward.
Egger, Egger, this long dress in my hand, it is not just a piece of clothing, it's a breeze of coolness on a summer day, a joyful melody dancing under the sun.
Egger, Egger, look at this long dress in my hand, it's not just a piece of fabric, it's the untouched pure land in our hearts, the tranquility and harmony deep within the soul.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to show he's engaging in abstract thinking?

content.content: (Takes out Egger's initial outfit from the backpack and hands it to him) I bet you're really cold, put this on quickly, Egger, and be careful not to catch a cold!
(Looking surprised) Egger, how could you be so careless? You look really awful, hurry and wipe off the water.
(Nonchalantly) Oh, it's fine, Egger, you're strong, a little water is nothing. Let's move on.
(Takes out a handkerchief from the backpack) Egger, use this to wipe your face, but I don't have any extra clothes for you.

question: #question#What should Xiaowei do to show he's considering the Painter's feelings?

dialog.content: Wait!!
Are you feeling any better?
Do I really have to spell it out? I've found that nothing good happens when I'm with you, so could you just disappear from my sight right now?
Xiaowei was dejectedly escorted out of the manor by Wubao.
You're really leaving me speechless...

Afterward, Egbert didn't say a word, he just left Xiao Wei there and walked away. Even when the bell for the party started ringing, he didn't return. Xiao Wei was regretfully 'escorted' out of the manor by Wubao.
Why do you have my clothes? Did you steal them?
No, no, no, it's because I really like the style of your clothes, so I designed a similar set.
Um, calm down. I know you like it a lot, but, no offense, I think painting requires a bit of talent. However, I do appreciate your effort.
Hmm... thank you.
Good. Now go hang out over there; I need to change clothes.
Okay.
(Takes out the key to the invitation) Weren't you after the invitation? Here's the key. You can leave first.

content.content: Oh, right, I should focus on completing the task and securing the ticket, so I'll head out first!
Before accepting this key, I'll devise a detailed plan of action. I believe this is crucial to demonstrating my task management skills.

To showcase my task management skills, I decided not to rush into it but to hold an emergency meeting, inviting all involved to discuss the key's potential value and the meaning behind the invitation.
Thank you for trusting me, but I understand that task management isn't just about execution speed, but also about resource allocation and precise risk assessment.

question: #question# How should Xiaowei respond to the painter to show he is good at task management?

content.content: You haven't given me a high five yet; I'm not leaving!
I think it's not just about getting a piece of paper, but a journey of exploration and discovering the unknown together.
Wow, you're so generous! I'll gladly accept and go ahead.
I do want that invitation, but I'd rather share my journey with you.
I do want that invitation, but I'd rather share my journey with you.
Wow, you're so generous! I'll gladly accept and go ahead.
I think it's not just about getting a piece of paper, but a journey of exploration and discovering the unknown together.

question: #question# How should Xiaowei express himself to the painter?

content.content: (Thinking back to when Edgar compared himself to Victor) I'm not leaving. Have you ever seen Victor abandon Viktor?
(Hesitated for a moment) Ah, really? That's great, thank you, Edgar. I'm heading out. Take care.
(Takes the key, but seems uneasy) This... doesn't feel right, Edgar. Are you sure you want me to leave first?
(Looks at the key, silent for a moment) Alright, since you say so, I'll go first. But please, be careful.
(Hesitated for a moment) Ah, really? That's great, thank you, Edgar. I'd love to spend more time with you.
(Takes the key, but seems uneasy) This... doesn't feel right, Edgar. Are you sure you want me to leave first?
(Looks at the key, silent for a moment) Maybe I can stay; I think our time together is more important.

question: #question# What should Xiaowei do to show he actively maintains the conversation with the painter?

dialog.content: Fine, just go!
Xiao Wei forgot that Wu Bao said they should 'pass through together,' and in the end, left the manor dejectedly, with Wu Bao sadly seeing him off.
So this was your real objective all along.
(feeling lost) No, no...
All along this journey, your flattery did have a purpose. How amusing that I actually thought...
I really want to be friends with you. I heard that this 'givemefive' is something important... but it's too abstract for me to understand right now...
Ah, so you're just confused about its meaning.
(quickly catching up with Aige's pace) Yeah, it really is just like that.
Alright then, let's work well together from here on.
Xiao Wei and the painter successfully opened the doors to the venue and obtained the invitation to the party.
(suddenly stunned) Hahaha, sorry, I just didn’t expect you to see our relationship that way.
(awkward but polite smile) Ahahaha...
In any case, if we really encounter monsters later, let’s work together.
Xiao Wei helped the Artist find their way out of the "labyrinth," and they successfully attended the evening party together.

profile.name: Mercenary
profile.public profile: As one of the Fifth Personas, he holds the ticket to the Oriety's Manor's Fifth Anniversary Celebration.
profile.goal: Make it to the banquet venue through the 'Maze'.

dialog.content: (seeing Xiaowei enthusiastically approaching) Who are you? Why did you ambush me? Are you the new overseer?
No, no, I'm just an ordinary detective. Someone invited me to the banquet.
Then why aren't you at the banquet and instead attacking me here?
It's not an ambush! I need to pass a test with one of the five people present to get their invitation in order to attend the banquet!
Oh, I'm busy with my meal. I have to go.
Would you be willing to cooperate with me?
I don't trust you. Who knows if you might ambush me halfway through.

content.content: (Since sweet-talking didn't work, plans to adapt to the situation by taking another route, deliberately appearing provocative) Are you that afraid of me?
(explains nervously) I really didn't mean that, please trust me!
(angrily rebuts) How can you doubt me like that? Don't we have any trust between us?
(giving up helplessly) Alright, if that's what you think, there's nothing I can do. Let's just leave it as it is.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to show he's adapting to new changes with the Mercenary?

content.content: (expressing his true feelings) Actually, I've liked you for a long time, so I really want to cooperate with you.
(changing the topic) Oh, why are we talking about this? Let's quickly think of how to get out of here.
(responds coldly) Whether you believe it or not doesn't matter to me. Anyway, I'll act according to my plan.
(defending) How could I possibly ambush you? It really hurts me when you say that.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei express his feelings to make them clear to the Mercenary?

content.content: (plans to trust in the power of a sign) Give me five!
(sneering coldly) Hmph, do you really think I'll trust you? I've seen plenty of people like you.
(hesitating) But... how do I know you won't betray me? I need more assurance.
(steps back warily) Don't come near me, I won't easily trust anyone.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei act to show he trusts the Mercenary?

dialog.content: You underestimate me? Then let's go, and see who's really scared...
I'm sorry for what I said earlier, it was intentional. You probably realized I was just trying to provoke you...
I thought you'd use that to your advantage. Why the sudden change of heart?
If I truly believed I could defeat you with such simple mind games, I would really be underestimating a former mercenary, right? More importantly, I don't want to deceive you...
You should be glad you made the right choice. But I'm a bit hungry now.

content.content: How about some popcorn? It's really tasty! I'm sure you'll like it!
If you're hungry, go find something to eat. See if there's anything you want?
(Teasing) Haha, looks like you're a foodie, but I have nothing for you to eat.
(Changing the subject) Oh, let's not talk about this. Let's hurry up and finish the task.

question: #question# How can Xiaowei show that he's trying to make the mercenary feel warm?
comfortable and happy

content.content: Who knows what lies ahead, since it's like this, why not have some wine?
Hahahaha, it doesn't matter, you're hungry and so am I!
Then let's all be hungry together, how about I tell you a joke?
Sigh, it's so sad, even as an optimistic person, I don't know what to do.

question: #question# How can Xiaowei respond to show the mercenary his optimism?

content.content: Haha, I'm a bit hungry too. I see I have some bread with eggs here, want to join me for a bite?
(Talking to himself) Oh, I'm also a bit hungry, but this might not suit your taste.
(Hesitantly) Uh... I do have food, but... are you sure you want to eat with me?
(Indifferently) If you're hungry, go find something to eat, I don't have much here.

question: #question# How can Xiaowei initiate and maintain an interaction with the mercenary?
skill

dialog.content: (heading to the maze) You go ahead and eat, I'll just have some bread.
Wait for me, I can't run fast.
Hurry up and chase!
Forget it, this isn't for me. I'd rather go home and play games.
Wu Bao watched Xiao Wei leave the manor with a look of utter disappointment.
Drinking before heading to the battlefield? Need some liquid courage? You drink it yourself.
(Feeling dizzy after drinking) Wait for me, I think I'm a bit... can't run...
Help! Who told you to drink!
The banquet bell tolls, and Xiao Wei sleeps soundly on the ground... Finally, Wu Bao wobbly escorts Xiao Wei out of the manor.
I didn't expect our tastes to be so similar.
Hehe, I'm glad you like it!
Then come along with me.
(Quickly keeping up with Naib's pace) Sure, but wait up for me, I can't walk that fast!
(Seeing an obstacle ahead) Hurry up and follow me, the exit isn't far from here. I'll distract that thing. Oh, and take this key.

content.content: Alright, I trust you. I'll wait for you at the entrance of the maze, I believe you’ll come back to find me!
(Hesitant) You're going to distract it alone? That's too dangerous, maybe we should go together.
(Takes the key but looks uneasy) Alright then, go ahead, but if you don't return, I'll go on my own.
(Doubtfully) Are you sure you can handle it? Don't leave me stranded here.

question: #question#What should Xiaowei do to show he trusts the Mercenary?

content.content: Huh? You want me to go ahead; I understand you're doing this for our safety, but facing danger alone is too much! Let's figure this out together!
(After hesitating, takes the key) Alright, since you say so, I'll go first, but be careful.
(Takes the key without hesitation) Alright, you go distract it. I’ll find the exit with the key; splitting up is more efficient.
Huh? You want me to go first; I understand you're doing this for our safety, but it feels unfair. We should draw straws to decide who stays; that's fairer to everyone.
Huh? You want me to go first; I understand you're doing this for our safety, but I think we should follow your lead since you're the expert.

question: #question#What should Xiaowei say to the Mercenary to show he upholds proper ethics?

dialog.content: Alright, I'm leaving.
Until the sound of the banquet bell rang, Naib still hadn't returned. Xiao Wei also lost the desire to attend the banquet, and in the end, Wu Bao escorted Xiao Wei out of the manor.
You don't need to worry about all that.
I want to leave with you. Splitting up with one escaping and one staying behind isn't victory!
I'm not as good at arguing as you are. If you don't leave now, I'll take my own life.
It's getting late! Hurry up and get out of the maze to collect the invitation!
Xiao Wei bid farewell to the mercenary, successfully opened the doors to the venue, and managed to get the invitation to attend the party.
Ah, are you out of your mind..?
Naib shot a bewildered look, then, as if seeing a ghost, he used his wrist guard to bounce away. Xiaowei was escorted out of the manor by Wubao.
Haha, revealed your true colors, haven't you!
What do you mean??
But coming at me head-on, I have to give you credit for that.

Before Xiao Wei could react, Naibu kicked him out of the main door, almost making him throw up his breakfast. Wubao felt sorry for Xiao Wei, packed a bag of bread for him, and sent him out of the manor, also secretly slipping some money into his pocket.
Alright, but let me remind you, most of the overseer's skills are disabled in the maze.
Why's that? I was hoping to try out the Water Mirror and Time Freeze!
What sort of game experience would that be?
Was it intentional?
Don't worry about it, just decide who you're going to accompany first.

content.content: I think I'll go with the Photographer, stick to my initial choice, hehe.
Before that, I'd like to close my eyes, take a few deep breaths, and let the voice of my heart guide me.
Haha, choosing such an important companion, how can I decide so carelessly? I should first check my horoscope to see what's in store.
Give me a moment; let me sort out my thoughts before giving you a sincere answer.

question: #question# How should Xiaowei respond to the Photographer to show he is staying true to his heart?

content.content: Alright then, I'll make a quick decision! I'll pick Madame Red!
Oh dear, how should I choose? Madame Red, Mr. White... I want to get to know each of them. Give me a bit more time!
Why not flip a coin to decide? That’s the quickest way!
Never mind, since it’s all the same, I'll just pick randomly. Red... no, Mr. White... no, Madame Red it is...

question: #question# How should Xiaowei respond to Wubao to show he is good at managing time?

dialog.content: Ah, don't get all starry-eyed.
Don't worry about it, I don't think anyone could say no to him...
Well, I don't think you have skin like his.
I should think about how to greet him first.

profile.name: Photographer
profile.public profile: One of the identities in the game, holding tickets to the five-year anniversary celebration at the Oletus Manor.
profile.goal: To reach the banquet venue through the 'Maze'.

dialog.content: Alright, make sure you know how to say hello to the photographer.

content.content: (With a spark of inspiration, he thinks of a new idea, takes a rose in his mouth, and approaches) Hola!
(Walks up and simply extends a hand) Hello, Joseph, I'm Xiaowei.
(Hesitates, then pulls a notebook and pen from his pocket, offers them to the photographer) Could I have your autograph? I really love your work.
(Suddenly becomes nervous, wringing his hands) I... I... How should I greet you? I haven't thought it through.

question: #question#What should Xiaowei say to the photographer to show his creativity?

content.content: (Trusting in the power of the code, believing the photographer will understand his intent) Hey, Joseph, give me five!
(Approaches the photographer but hesitates, ultimately just whispering) Um... Mr. Joseph, hello.
(Stands there, carefully watching the photographer's reaction before cautiously asking) Joseph, are you sure you get this code? What if we got it wrong?
(Thinks for a moment, decides not to take the risk) Hey, Joseph, I actually came to ask some questions about photography.

question: #question#What should Xiaowei do to display his trust in the photographer?

content.content: (Walks up to the photographer with growing confidence) Hey, good evening, Mr. Joseph!!
Good evening, Mr. Joseph! I'm feeling great today, I think this is a perfect chance to show my confidence.
(Takes a few steps, stops, looks back at 'Wubao' as if seeking confirmation, then musters up courage, almost whispering) Mr. Joseph, good evening.
(Nervously rubs his hands, then loudly and awkwardly says) Um... Mr. Joseph, I'm... I'm here to say hi, good evening!

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to show his full confidence to the photographer?

dialog.content: Funny, isn't it?
Before Xiaowei could react, he was thrown out of the manor by Joseph.
What are you doing?
That's not how you use 'give me five'! If you still don’t get it, I suggest you just say hello properly.
Alright then, sigh.
Xiaowei was escorted out of the manor by Wubao, leaving with regret.
Hey there, unfamiliar face. Are you new here?
Yes, I was invited to the fifth anniversary banquet, but I need the invitation from a companion.
Have you chosen me as your companion?
Is that possible?

Alright, but I wasn't actually planning to attend the banquet. If you need the invitation, I only have the key here. See, this is it. The invitation seems to be in a storage box at the maze's exit. You should get it yourself.

content.content: Ah, please come with me, I want to go with you, and I'm really scared to go alone.
I think this will be a very interesting experience, and I'm looking forward to seeing some new places.
I want to ask you to accompany me. Although I'm not that scared, I feel much more at ease when you're around.
Haha, it's alright, going on an adventure alone sounds fun too. Thank you for letting me in on this secret!

question: #question#What should Xiao Wei do to express his thoughts to the Photographer?

content.content: No, no, I have so many photography questions I want to discuss with you! Who knows, we might spark something amazing in the field of photography.
What? You don't want to go to the banquet? Then the invitation is useless to me! Can't you help me find one?

I see. Then I'll go to the maze's exit for the invitation myself. But I've heard you're quite experienced in photography, if there's a chance at the banquet, I'd like to seek some advice from you on photography.

Hmm, I understand you don't want to attend the banquet. However, I heard there will be many big names in photography there, I think it's a great opportunity. I plan to look for collaboration opportunities there.

question: #question#What should Xiao Wei do to show he wants to collaborate with the Photographer?

dialog.content: Actually, I don’t think this role suits you very well, because I can't provide you with a sense of security.
Joseph left the hall, destination unknown... Xiaowei unfortunately had to be escorted out of the manor by Wubao.
Are you also interested in photography?
Ah, yes, yes.
But I really can't go with you. To apologize, let me take a picture of you!
No, no, a camera without beauty filters will surely take ugly pictures!
Aren't the photos taken by a camera the true image? What do you think is the image I present to you right now?

content.content: Hmm. Let me think for myself. I feel like you are an elegant noble.
I need to judge for myself. The camera indeed captures reality, but I see you as a mentor, guiding us to understand the depth of the world.
Hmm... I think, as everyone says, you're probably a professional photographer, right?
Let me think independently. I believe a camera can show the truth, but to me, you are more like an adventurer, bravely exploring the unknown world.

question: #question#How should Xiao Wei answer the photographer to demonstrate his independent thinking?

content.content: (Feeling a bit impatient but calming down) Ah, you are the overseer named Joseph.
How do I know what image you present to me? I'm not a painter, just good at looking at the camera!
(Nearly blurted out, but held back) Hmm, you are that artist capturing moments with a camera.
I know you're a photographer, but I'm more curious about what you see of me through the lens.

question: #question#How should Xiao Wei answer the photographer to show he's consciously controlling his impulse?

content.content: In my eyes, you are like a passionate photography enthusiast. Your work always brings energy to people, unlike a mere overseer.
I think your work is just okay, nothing special, don't overestimate yourself.
I don't know how to describe you, anyway, you're just someone who takes pictures, right?
The pictures a camera takes may be realistic, but right now you're just an ordinary overseer to me, nothing special.
I think your work is just alright, nothing special, don’t overestimate yourself.
I don't know how to describe you—you're just someone who takes photos, right?

question: #question#How should Xiao Wei speak to make the photographer feel comfortable?

dialog.content: Hehe, thank you for the compliment.
Just speaking the truth, hehe.
It seems like there's a monster ahead. I'll go alone, don't follow me. Just wait for me at the exit.
Ah, alright then.

Xiao Wei waited at the exit for a long time, but Joseph never came out. As time was running out, he took the key himself to open the safe, only to find it empty. He had forgotten the game rule that Wu Bao mentioned about needing to 'pass through together with them.' As a result, Wu Bao sent him out of the manor.
(As usual, smiling) Yeah, who else could I be? I'm just one of the overseers of this estate...
Are you unhappy?
Not really. There seems to be a monster ahead. I'll go by myself, don't follow me, just wait for me at the exit.
Faced with Joseph's kindness, Xiao Wei felt guilty, thinking he was unworthy of participating in the banquet and planned to quit the competition, ultimately being escorted out of the estate by Wubao.
Finally dropped the formalities with me?
Huh? Was I being too rude?
Not at all, I won't hold it against kids! By the way!
Then let's walk this road together!
(Successfully walking out of the maze with Xiao Wei to the mailbox at the entrance) You take the key and get the invitation!
After getting the invitation, Joseph and Xiao Wei headed towards the banquet hall.
Alright, alright, but you better be careful.
Ah, I was planning to give her a big hug.
Are you crazy!
What's wrong?
Are you crazy! She used to be the Empress. Be mindful of your status.

content.content: (boldly stepping forward to greet Madam Hong cheek-to-cheek) I believe Madam Hong will appreciate it.
(hesitates a bit with his hand mid-air, finally just waves awkwardly) Uh, maybe I got a bit too impulsive.
(looks at 'Wubao', then at Madam Hong, and mumbles) Is she really the Empress? Should I be more cautious?
(stops in his tracks, nervously rubbing his hands, says to 'Wubao') Or, maybe I should ask Madam Hong if she agrees first? Wouldn't that be more appropriate?

question: #question# How should Xiaowei respond to Madam Hong to show he's full of confidence?

content.content: (overcoming anxiety and fear, tidies his clothes) Hello, may I interrupt you for a moment?
(face turns pale, he looks around frantically, muttering) What should I do? What should I do? She used to be the Empress, I...I...
(suddenly turns and runs, shouting back) Sorry! I...I just remembered I have something urgent to handle!
(glares angrily at 'Wubao', retorts loudly) What gives you the right to say that? I don't care who she was, it’s all the same now!

question: #question# How can Xiaowei respond to Madam Hong to show he's managing his stress?

content.content: (considering Madam Hong's preferences and thinking she might be hungry, picks a few small cakes from the table) Madam Hong, would you like a piece of cake?
Oh, so what if she was the Empress? Isn’t she just like us now? Here, have this hard bun, don't be picky.
(only thinking of himself, grabs a big cake and starts eating) This cake is really good, too bad you can't have any.
Here, take this. It’s not very good, but it's better than nothing.

question: #question# How can Xiaowei respond to show he's considerate of Madam Hong's feelings?

profile.name: Madam Red
profile.public profile: As one of the Fifth Personalities, she holds a ticket to the celebration banquet for the Fifth Anniversary of the Orithis Manor.
profile.goal: Get through the 'Maze' to reach the banquet venue.

dialog.content: (seeing the enthusiastic Xiaowei about to jump at her) What do you think you’re doing!!!!!
Xiaowei was forced out of the manor at knifepoint by Madam Red.
Are you the new servant? There's no need to tidy the dining table here.
You misunderstand, I'm a detective here for the party. I'm currently looking for my fellow guest. Plus, I must obtain the invitation in their possession to officially attend.
Oh, I see. Then this key should open the place where your invitation is kept, right?
Would you be willing to give it to me?
Sure thing, let's head out now!
(Suddenly hit by a monster) Oh my, that hurts!
Don't be afraid, nothing here will cause actual death.
But the pain at that moment was real, I still want to protect myself.
In that case, I think this place isn't suitable for you. It's best if you leave.
Persuaded by Lady Hong, Xiao Wei left and was escorted out of the manor by Wu Bao.
Are you the new servant? I didn't say I wanted cake.
No, I'm just a detective trying to attend this banquet. But I need an invitation from a companion to join in smoothly.
Oh, here's a key for you. It might open the invitation you mentioned.
(thinking about the many unknown monsters ahead) I'll walk with you on the road ahead and protect you.
I'm just a supervisor. What's worth protecting about that?

content.content: How could you say that? You're definitely worth protecting. I think you might need a hug, let me hold you, and I hope you won't be sad anymore.
Everyone has their role, and supervisors are indispensable. But as for what to protect, that's your own choice.
How could you think that way? Supervisors also have their responsibilities, and they can't always think about being protected.
Uh, well... I'm not very good at comforting people. But, I believe you can handle it yourself.

question: #question#How should Xiaowei act to show he's trying to make Madam Hong feel comfortable?
social warmth

content.content: (Giving the beautiful gem on the table to Madam Hong) Look! There are so many beautiful things in this world, and you need to protect yourself well to have more chances to see them!
(Casually picking up an ordinary stone and giving it to Madam Hong) Here, take this, it's not of any use anyway.
You're right, there's not much worth protecting. Why not just give up?
(Glancing around, suddenly picking up a sharp dagger and handing it to Madam Hong) Use this to protect yourself. If anyone dares to bully you, fight back with it!

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to Madam Hong to show he's making a well-thought-out decision?

content.content: Please don't think that way. Even if things are tough right now, we have to face life with a positive and optimistic attitude. That's the way to live better!
Yeah, you're right. What can we even do? This world is just so cruel. No matter how hard we try, we can't change it.
Hmm, I understand how you feel, but sometimes, even optimism doesn't help, does it? Reality is just that harsh.
(Scoffing, saying disdainfully) Stop wallowing in self-pity. Everyone's in the same boat these days. What's the big deal?

question: #question#How should Xiaowei respond to Madam Hong to show his optimistic attitude?

dialog.content: (Seeing Xiaowei coming over for a hug, shocked) What do you think you're doing?
I just wanted to...
That's no excuse for being disrespectful!
No, I...
Don't come any closer!
Madam Red stormed off angrily from Xiaowei, and Xiaowei was escorted out of the manor by Wubao.
I've had more of these things than anyone else ever has, but what’s the point? I'm sorry, I’m a bit tired and can't join you for the banquet. You keep the key.
Wait. Wait..

After Lady Red left, time was running out, so Xiao Wei had no choice but to head for the exit with the key. He opened the invitation box Lady Red mentioned, but since he had forgotten what Wu Bao said about needing to ‘pass through with them’, he was ultimately sent out of the manor.
Are you... majoring in literature?
No, not really, these are just words from the heart.
Alright, then let's keep going.
(Sees Mary being attacked by a mud monster) Oh my god, watch out!
Help, I feel like it's so filthy!

content.content: (Adapting to the situation, he plans to grab Mary's hand to escape) Let's run!
Huh? What should I do? I'm also scared of this muck!
Don't be afraid, let's think of a solution. Though I haven't figured it out yet.
Where do we run? There's muck here too, and it's not necessarily safe over there.
Huh? What should I do? I'm also scared of this muck!
Don't be afraid, let's think of a solution. Though I haven't figured it out yet.
Where do we run? There's muck here too, and it's not necessarily safe over there.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to Madam Hong to show he is adapting to new changes?

content.content: (Steps forward and uses his body to shield Mary from the attacking muck) Don't be scared, I'll protect you!
Don't be so squeamish, it's just some muck. Can't you dodge it yourself?
Oh dear, what do I do? I'm also afraid of dirt; let's run together!
Please bear with it for a while. Let me clean myself up first.
Don't be so squeamish, it's just some muck. Can't you dodge it yourself?
Oh dear, what do I do? I'm also afraid of dirt; let's run together!
Please bear with it for a while. Let me clean myself up first.

question: #question# How should Xiao Wei respond to show he is considerate of Madam Hong's feelings?

dialog.content: Haha!
What's so funny? Did I do something wrong?
Oh, nothing. I just find your anxious look quite adorable. Let's go, it's time to attend the banquet. I'll cover your back!
Xiao Wei received the invitation from Madam Hong and headed to the banquet.
Why... are you standing in front of me?
I figured you probably hate getting dirty with these filthy things!
You're quite sweet. Go on, head to the party.
Madam Hong is touched by Xiao Wei's kind gesture and decides to give him the invitation to attend the party.
